entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Dolbeau-Mistassini
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to a few rain showers and ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
